text: The 1984 LPGA Championship was the 30th LPGA Championship, played May 31 to June 3 at Jack Nicklaus Golf Center at Kings Island in Mason, Ohio, a suburb northeast of Cincinnati. Defending champion Patty Sheehan shot 131 (−13) on the weekend to win the second of her three LPGA Championships, ten strokes ahead of runners-up Pat Bradley and ==Past champions in the field== ===Made the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || R3 || R4 || Total || To par || Finish |- | align=left|Patty Sheehan || align=left| || 1983 || 71 || 70 || 63 || 68 || 272 || −16 || 1 |- |align=left|Nancy Lopez|| align=left| || 1978 || 75 || 70 || 73 || 72 || 290 || +2 || T14 |- | align=left|Sally Little || align=left| || 1980 || 71 || 75 || 75 || 71 || 292 || +4 || T20 |- | align=left|Jan Stephenson || align=left| || 1982 || 77 || 74 || 71 || 70 || 291 || +4 || T20 |- |align=left|Sandra Haynie || align=left| ||1965, 1974 || 71 || 73 || 74 || 77 || 295 || +8 || T37 |} Source: ===Missed the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || Total || To par |- |align=left|Donna Caponi || align=left| ||1979, 1981 || 74 || 83 || 157 || +13 |- | align=left|Marlene Hagge || align=left| || 1956 || 78 || 79 || 157 || +13 |- | align=left|Louise Suggs || align=left| || 1957 || 88 || 78 || 166 || +22 |} Source: ==Final leaderboard== Sunday, June 3, 1984 {|class="wikitable" !
